title: The End of the Chicago Cubs’ (Nonexistent) Dynasty
text:
The Chicago Cubs seemed fated for a sustained run of overwhelming dominance led by a core of transcendent young talent after their curse-breaking World Series championship in 2016. That once-inevitable dynasty died at Pittsburgh’s PNC Park on Wednesday, killed by the Milwaukee Brewers’ playoff-clinching win nearly 300 miles away in Cincinnati, officially eliminating the 2019 Cubs from contention. The dynasty had no age—because it never actually existed.

The cause of death was an organization-wide failure: a lethal combination...
description: Just three seasons after a World Series title, the Cubs have engaged in a slow decline that has now brought them to a moment of reckoning.
